Jeff Sweeney T206 PSA 6 with solid Old Mill back. POP of 1 (Old Mill) with only a total of 17 graded higher (all backs). Centering is nearly perfect, with excellent eye appeal. SOLD/insured delivery with dc included. Prefer Paypal "gift", but will accept check or money order.  

email = [url]timothy_browne@hotmail.com[/url]

Thank you Bill........card will ship 5/9.   Tim
Thanks Bill.........card will ship tomorrow, 5/9. Tim
